summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ORSA Natural premium Synthetic Short Wavy Bob Wigs With Airs Bangs For Black & White Women 14 Inch Natural Looking Shoulder Length Full Hair Bob Curly Wig As Real Hair for Daily Use(Ombre Blonde)
Review Date: 2021/01/11
Store: ORSA
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'ORSA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.42 x 7.8 x 2.56 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '688529158046'}
Review Text: I was really looking forward to this wig because it looked so cute on one of the previous reviewers. It looked ok when it arrived and came with some little extra gifts, but when I put it on I realized it fit weird. It made me look like I had a big lump on one side of my head. I took it off and inspected it and found some weird really short hairs sticking in the lumpy spot, like someone had chopped off a clump of hair. I’m bummed because I’ve been having a hard time finding a good ombré blond wig.
Review Title: Defective
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DWMGLP 14" Short Red Curly Wig For Women Girls Heat Resistant Fiber Wigs Halloween Cosplay Daily Party+Cap (Red)
Review Date: 2021/01/17
Store: DWMGLP
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'DWMGLP', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 8.31 x 1.77 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: This wig is awful. It is super small, thin hair, poorly constructed, really weird, narrow bangs. I tried unsuccessfully to fix it by trimming more bangs so I can’t return it. It’s a $7 wig, tops.
Review Title: Not worth it
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Isaic Wavy Wig With Bangs Women's Short Bob Gray Pink Wig Curly Wavy Shoulder Length Pastel Bob Synthetic Cosplay Wig for Girl Colorful Costume Wigs
Review Date: 2021/01/17
Store: Isaic
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9 x 7 x 3 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Isaic', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 7 x 3 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '778992676588'}
Review Text: I wanted to like this wig. The color is nice and the hair looks pretty natural, but very thin and the wig cap is very small. Weird narrow bangs too.
Review Title: Sadly disappointing
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sallcks Ombre Blonde Short Bob Wig for Women Short Layered Blonde Wig Cosplay Custome Synthetic Hair Wig
Review Date: 2021/01/25
Store: Sallcks
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Sallcks', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 7.52 x 1.26 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '723849438468'}
Review Text: This wig looked absolutely ridiculous and very fake. The hair is not soft and it sits on top of my head, making me look like a nasty, used Q-tip. The second I put it on and looked in the mirror, I burst out laughing. So, if you need a good laugh, this wig is for you. If you want an attractive, flattering wig that looks remotely realistic, look elsewhere.
Review Title: Dirts Q-tip look
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a distinct pattern of mixed sentiment regarding synthetic wigs, particularly a preference for vivid colors and styles such as wavy and curly. They consistently express disappointment in product quality, particularly fit and construction, indicating a significant expectation for realistic, flattering hair options. Most ratings for wigs fall below average (1.0 to 3.5), suggesting frustration with the perceived value and quality versus cost. 

In contrast, the purchase of holographic nail polish showcases a positive experience with a higher rating (4.0), indicating an appreciation for vibrant aesthetics and satisfying product performance in cosmetics. This suggests a tendency to favor visually appealing products that deliver good quality, particularly in lower price ranges, but with a growing dissatisfaction in the wig category overall.

The analysis reflects a core preference for colorful, stylish products but a recurring discontent with the quality and fit of synthetic hairpieces, pointing towards a price sensitivity where cheap, poor-quality items fall short of expectations. Thus, this shopper seeks well-constructed, aesthetically pleasing options that justify their expenses, favoring cosmetics over wigs which have consistently disappointed.

target_interaction.title: Narrow bangs
target_interaction.text: This wig is thin and the bags are so long and narrow. They don’t look like the photo. I don’t mind trimming them but making them wider is a challenge when you’re not a professional.
target_interaction.title_meta: VCKOVCKO Natural Wavy Short Wigs With Air Bangs Women's Shoulder Length Curly Wavy Synthetic Cosplay Wig Bob Wig for Girl Colorful Wigs(12", Thin Rattan)
